conbody.p: The contracting officer shall insert a provision substantially the same as the provision at 52.236-27 , Site Visit (Construction), in solicitations which include the clauses at 52.236-2 , Differing Site Conditions, and 52.236-3 , Site Investigations and Conditions Affecting the Work. AlternateI may be used when an organized site visit will be conducted.
